Curated Resources For Learning Web Development

Here's a list of curated resources I've been using in learning web development. I plan on updating it as I go along. Feel free to share your own below.

HTML & CSS

  • Code Academy
    • HTML & CSS
    • Make a Website
  • HTML Dog
  • Learn To Code in HTML and CSS
  • Learn To Code Advanced HTML and CSS
  • Enjoy CSS
  • Learn Layout
  • CSS-Tricks
  • The Code Player
  • HTML Cheat Sheet
  • CSS Cheat Sheet
  • CSS Reference
  • CSS Zen Garden
  • Colorzilla for Chrome
  • HTML5 Rocks
  • FreeCodeCamp HTML & CSS

JavaScript & jQuery

  • Javascript Road Trip 1, 2 & 3
  • Codeacademy's Javascript
  • Try jQuery
  • jQuery The return Flight
  • Pluralsight
  • Treehouse
  • Frontendmasters
